title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.14 - Toilet rooms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.14 - Toilet rooms

State Regulations

Toilet rooms shall be completely enclosed and shall have
tight-fitting, self-closing solid doors, except for louvers that may be
necessary for ventilation systems. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-6.14

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
